column1: CROF by Green Team Kohima work as a catalyst between affected people & those willing 2 help out but cannot involve directly.While d pandemic can be contained,hunger & starvation can't be postponed or keep a hold. #standforhumanity #greenteamkohima #kohima #nagaland #covid_19
